name: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
description:
The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor is a 3D action-adventure game for the Nintendo DS played from a bird-eye perspective that was released alongside the movie of the same name.

The game follows the story of the movie. You play as either Rick O'Connell or his son, Alex O'Connell and have to thwart the plans of the Dragon emperor and his Terracotta army.

Gameplay includes puzzle-solving, hand to hand combat and gun fights. Sometimes objects have to be moved to reach certain places. The game leads you trough locations from the movie including the Himalaya.

For mobile phones, a different fully 2D game was released. The PlayStation 2 & Wii received a different fully 3D game.
